content.text: Match ends, Shakhtar Donetsk 5, BATE Borisov 0.
Second Half ends, Shakhtar Donetsk 5, BATE Borisov 0.
Goal!  Shakhtar Donetsk 5, BATE Borisov 0. Luiz Adriano (Shakhtar Donetsk) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Ivan Ordets following a corner.
Corner,  Shakhtar Donetsk. Conceded by Edgar Olekhnovich.
Attempt blocked. Douglas Costa (Shakhtar Donetsk) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Darijo Srna.
Attempt blocked. Alex Teixeira (Shakhtar Donetsk) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Luiz Adriano.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Denis Polyakov (BATE Borisov) because of an injury.

Corner,  Shakhtar Donetsk. Conceded by Edgar Olekhnovich.
Goal!  Shakhtar Donetsk 4, BATE Borisov 0. Luiz Adriano (Shakhtar Donetsk) right footed shot from very close range to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Douglas Costa with a cross.

Goal!  Shakhtar Donetsk 3, BATE Borisov 0. Luiz Adriano (Shakhtar Donetsk) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom left corner.
